docs.lead_paragraph: It is a case that pits a mother desperately seeking a medical treatment for her son against a biotechnology company for whom she claims to have worked tirelessly as an advocate.

headline.main: Advocating a Treatment, but Denied Access to It
headline.sub: Fairness to Patients Leads to Conflict;
headline.print_headline: Advocating a Treatment, but Denied Access to It

docs.snippet: It is a case that pits a mother desperately seeking a medical treatment for her son against a biotechnology company for whom she claims to have worked tirelessly as an advocate.

docs.lead_paragraph: A series of case reports indicates that a rare type of leg fracture is linked to osteoporosis treatment.

headline.seo: A Rare Type of Leg Fracture Is Linked to Osteoporosis Drugs
headline.main: Drugs to Build Bones May Weaken Them
headline.print_headline: Drugs to Build Bones May Weaken Them

docs.snippet: A series of case reports indicates that a rare type of leg fracture is linked to osteoporosis treatment.
